Painted Earth.knownFor: “ the Painted Earth - Menifee ” Reviewed July 31, 2014 Painted Earth is an inspiring and relaxing atmosphere to explore your creative spirit. A gathering place for family and friends to celebrate while creating your own unique piece of art. No reservations or experience is needed. The way it works is you go in.. pay a studio fee of $6 (which includes all the paint brushes etc you will need...
